metadata.Title: CVE-2020-8449 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in Squid before 4.10. Due to incorrect inputvalidation, it can interpret crafted HTTP requests in unexpected ways toaccess server resources prohibited by earlier security filters.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-8449` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

squid - 3.5.27-1ubuntu1.5
squid-cgi - 3.5.27-1ubuntu1.5
squid-common - 3.5.27-1ubuntu1.5
squid-purge - 3.5.27-1ubuntu1.5
squid3 - 3.5.27-1ubuntu1.5
squidclient - 3.5.27-1ubuntu1.5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: squid3 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.5.27-1ubuntu1.5').
